item.title: Episode 3 - Tara Vancil and Paul Frazee
item.description:
Our guests on this episode are Tara Vancil and Paul Frazee from Blue Link Labs, the makers of Beaker Browser!

Highlighted Events

  • Code for Science and Society May Community Call
  • JSConfEU

Guests: Tara Vancil and Paul Frazee

  • Tara Vancil
  • Paul Frazee
  • Beaker Browser
  • Blue Link Labs

  • dat-fox
  • DatPart
  • libdweb

Hashbase and Homebase

  • Hashbase
  • Homebase

Dat Enhancement Proposals

  • DEPs
  • Working Group

More Projects

  • NodeVMS alpha: trustless execution of services on nodejs
  • Fritter
  • WebDB

Dat vs. IPFS vs. Secure Scuttlebutt

  • Dat Project
  • IPFS
  • Secure Scuttlebutt
  • IPFS vs Dat
  • Gozala's comparison

item.title: Episode 2 - Danielle Robinson and Joe Hand
item.description:
Our guests are Danielle Robinson and Joe Hand who are co-executive directors of Code For Science and Society, the non-profit organization that runs the Dat Project.

Links

Danielle Robinson

  • dat://about-danielle.hashbase.io/
  • Twitter: @daniellecrobins

Joe Hand

  • https://joeahand.com/
  • Twitter: @joeahand

Code for Science and Society

  • Code for Science and Society
  • Dat Project

Recent Events

  • Dat Shopping List Demo
  • HyperDB 3.0.0
  • Peer-to-Peer Web New York
  • DNS based dat:// lookups in Beaker Browser
  • Cabal Chat Client

Upcoming Events

  • Thu May 31 - Code for Science Community Call
  • Thu Mar 31 - Berlin - Beaker Browser Hack Night
  • Jun 2 & 3 - Berlin - JSConfEU
    • Paul Frazee
    • Tara Vancil
    • Emil Bay
  • Jun 13 - San Francisco - Decentralized Web Meetup at the Internet Archive

Danielle Robinson

  • OHSU Neuroscience
  • Open Access
  • OpenCon
  • Data Refuge
  • Project Svalbard
  • Practical Decentralization
  • Charcot-Marie-Tooth disease

Joe Hand

  • Periscopic
  • Santa Fe Institute + Slum/Shack Dwellers International
  • Dat Command Line

Interview Links

  • Jeremy Freeman
  • Janelia Labs
  • Dat Protocol Working Group / DEPs
  • Dat Governance Framework
  • Code for Science & Society
  • CS&S Collaborative Communities Project
  • Request For Commits – Episode #6
  • Dat Desktop
  • datBase
  • Internet Archive
  • California Digital Library
  • Dash

More podcasts and videos to listen to

  • https://www.dataengineeringpodcast.com/dat-with-danielle-robinson-and-joe-hand-episode-16/
  • http://pursuit.tech/2018/05/08/funding-with-grants-danielle-robinson/
  • Portland State University and Online Northwest Keynote: A Vision for Decentralized Data

item.title: Episode 1 - Mathias Buus (@mafintosh)
item.description:
We invite Mathias onto the show and talk about the upcoming Dat Multiwriter feature
* http://github.com/mafintosh * https://peer-to-peer-web.com/

item.title: Episode 0 - Welcome to the DatCast!
item.description:
The first episode, where Bret and Jim try making a podcast for the first time, and explain what they want the show to be.
Links:
* https://peer-to-peer-web.com/los-angeles/2018-04-28 * https://twitter.com/mafintosh/status/989214862764118016
